title: Chainz (PcGame) (Full)
description:

Chainz

============================================


System Requirements
-------------------

* Windows 98/ME/2000/XP
* 300Mhz or faster Processor
* 64MB RAM
* DirectSound-compatible Sound Card
* DirectX 7.0 or better


How To Play
-----------

BASICS:

Rotate chain links to create chains of 3 or more matching color links
horizontally or vertically. Simply click on a link to rotate it. Matching color
links will automatically link up.

Note: While black links can link up, they cannot be rotated.

* Each complete chain adds to the progress bar to the right of the playfield.
* The round ends once the progress bar is completely filled.

BONUS LINKS:

x2 Bonus Links.: Multiply total chain value by 2.
x5 Bonus Links.: Multiply total chain value by 5.
Letter Links...: Add letters to spell "CHAINZ" and earn the CHAINZ Bonus.
Universal Links: Can link with any other color link.


Scoring
-------

Normal Links...:  100 points
Universal Links:  250 points
x2 Bonus Links.:  200 points
x5 Bonus Links.:  500 points
Letter Links...: 1000 points

* Points are awarded based on the number of links in a chain, any bonus links
  inside of it and the current round.

* Increasing bonuses are applied to each successive chain reaction.

* CHAINZ Bonus: Collecting all 6 letters and spelling "CHAINZ" earns 25,000 pts.


New Game
--------

STARTING ROUND:

* Selects the round the game will start on.
* 1 = Easy. 5 = Medium. 10 = Hard.

PLAY MODES:

Normal.....: Untimed mode.

Time Attack: Timed mode. Fill the progress bar before time expires. Extra time
             is awarded for each chain completed. 500 points is awarded for each
             second left at the end of each round. Game ends when time runs out.

Note: If a saved game is detected after you choose New Game from the main menu,
you will be given the option to continue the game instead of starting a new one.


Troubleshooting
---------------

This software has been tested extensively to make sure it will operate
correctly for all users. If you experience system crashes, error messages or
other incorrect behavior, we suggest you first try one of the following:

1) Upgrade your computer&#039;s sound card drivers. This can be done by identifying
the type of sound card your computer is using and finding the manufacturer&#039;s web
site. Or, most drivers will be automatically updated if you follow step #2.

2) Upgrade DirectX. This is a Microsoft component and it includes special
drivers for video cards and sound cards for virtually every manufacturer. It is
therefore a very large download, but updating DirectX solves nearly all system
problems encountered with GameHouse games.

DirectX Home Page: http://www.microsoft.com/directx/

If Chainz crashes for some reason, a window may appear where you can enter
your e-mail address and report the problem to MumboJumbo. This information will
assist in determining the cause of the problem.

For support issues relating to the operation of this software, please use our
customer product support form located at: http://www.gamehouse.com/bugform.jsp


About GameHouse
---------------

GameHouse, Inc. develops many games for the Internet, Windows, Macintosh and
other platforms such as Palm OS. To view the full complement of games available
and play free games online, visit: http://www.gamehouse.com/
